column7: Document Technologies, Inc. is a United States-based provider of litigation, discovery and managed support services for the legal and corporate markets in the United States. Its services include discovery and review services, management services, knowledge solutions, and printing and production services. Discovery and review services include litigation readiness and legal hold consulting, data acquisition and forensics, ESI processing and hosting, managed document review, paper-based discovery services and LitWorks discovery training. The Knowledge Solutions platform is comprised of two main offerings: managed services and staffing and placement services. DTI offers a suite of printing and production services: color and black and white copies, oversize color and black and white copies, posters, brochures, pamphlets, banners, advertising and marketing materials, transparencies and custom tabs.
